levels.description: The ground level of the farmhouse is dedicated to the two-car garage and main entrance area. This level also includes a service corridor that connects to the rest of the building.

rooms.notes: Built with reinforced concrete for durability, with proper ventilation.
Provides seamless transition between garage and main living areas. Vastu principles suggest the entry should be oriented in a favorable direction.

openings.location: South side of building to harness positive energy according to Vastu
Connected from the garage to the service corridor

levels.description: The first floor of the living area is designed following Bohemian style with open spaces and vibrant interior design. It includes the kitchen, dining, living room and a utility zone.

rooms.notes: Features natural light from adjacent windows; designed to be functional yet aesthetically pleasing. Vastu suggests keeping the stove facing east.
Spacious open design with Bohemian decor elements.
Centrally located with multiple windows to ensure a well-lit space and proper Vastu alignment.

rooms.purpose: Storage for appliances and cleaning supplies
rooms.notes: Adjacent to the kitchen with easy access.

openings.location: North wall of living room for maximum light
East wall of dining room to enhance Vastu alignment

levels.description: The second floor is dedicated to private spaces including three bedrooms with one being a master suite and two additional guest rooms. It also includes a balcony.

rooms.notes: Features an ensuite bathroom and a personal balcony. The master suite is positioned in the southwest corner following Vastu guidelines for stability.
Located on the east side of the upper floor to receive natural light and positive energy.
Placed on the west side of the upper floor to balance energy flow.
Adjacent to master suite offering privacy and scenic views. Designed with Bohemian decor in mind.

openings.location: South wall of master suite for privacy and calm
East wall of guest rooms for optimal morning light
